title: Judi Dench
summary: Dame Judith Olivia Dench, CH, DBE, FRSA (born 9 December 1934) is an English actress. Regarded as one of the best actresses in British history,[1] she is seen as a "peerless performer" with roles ranging from the James Bond films to Shakespearean dramas.[2] She has been named Britain's best actor on multiple occasions.[3][4]
